value:
$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|This way, children of Midgard.
Follow me.$k$pWe make for the foot of that hill
just ahead. From there, we will
proceed to the realm of light.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Right behind you, Seiðr!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Behold. That is the gateway to the
realm of light.$k$p$EFace_Pain|Oh...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What's wrong?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Urrgh...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|What is it?$k$p$SbpBGM_MNS_FE12_06,0|$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|Children of Midgard...forgive me!$k$pThis is embarrassing to admit, but...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What's the matter?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|It seems I've...gone the wrong way!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|A-are you lost?!$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|I wanted to hurry, and I...well...$k$pI will never recover from this shame!
I am a goddess meant to guide you
mortals...and yet, I have failed you...$k$pI wish I could just disappear!
Vanish into some hole and never
come out! It's what I deserve!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|You don't need to worry! Everyone
makes mistakes sometimes. We can
figure this out!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Are we sure following her
is a good idea?$k$pShe doesn't seem to be our enemy,
it's true, but now I have different
concerns about this.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Indeed.$k$p$EFace|Seiðr... The hill you spoke of...
Did you mean to lead us toward
Sunbeam Hill?$k$pIf so, it's this way. I can lead
us there.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|...Thank you for your help, child
of Midgard.$k$p$Sbs150|
